mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) AS COUNT FROM ( SELECT B.OR_NO AS RECEIPTNO , (CASE WHEN C.SALES_ORD_NO IS NULL THEN SOM.SALES_ORD_NO ELSE C.SALES_ORD_NO END) AS ORDERNO , TO_CHAR(trx.TRX_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS TRX_DATE, (CASE WHEN D.NAME IS NULL THEN CTD.NAME ELSE D.NAME END) NAME , E.ACC_CODE AS BANK_ACC , F.ACC_CODE AS DEBT_CODE , G.CODE AS BranchCode , A.PAY_ITM_APPV_NO AS PayItemAppvNo , A.PAY_ITM_CHQ_NO AS PayItemChqNo, H.USER_NAME AS UserName, I.CODE_DESC AS Description, A.PAY_ITM_AMT AS PayItemAmt, A.PAY_ITM_REM AS PayItemRemark, j.CODE AS code, A.PAY_ITM_ORI_CC_NO AS fPayItemCCNo, NVL(b.TR_NO, ' ') AS TR_NO , NVL(a.PAY_ITM_REF_NO, ' ') AS REF_NO , (CASE WHEN a.PAY_ITM_IS_ONLINE = 1 THEN 'Online' WHEN a.PAY_ITM_IS_ONLINE = 2 THEN 'Offline' ELSE ' ' END) AS CRCMode , k.CODE_DESC AS CRCType , a.PAY_ITM_CC_HOLDER_NAME AS PayItemCCHolderName, a.PAY_ITM_CC_EXPR_DT AS PayItemCCExpiryDate, a.PAY_ITM_REF_DT AS RefDate , l.USER_NAME AS keyInBy , NVL(BNK.CODE, ' ') AS issuedBank , NVL(sdm.DEPT_NAME, ' ') AS DeptCode , (CASE WHEN ssc.NAME IS NULL THEN STC.NAME ELSE SSC.NAME END) AS OrderStatus , (CASE WHEN D.CUST_VA_NO IS NULL THEN CTD.CUST_VA_NO ELSE D.CUST_VA_NO END) AS custVaNo , A.PAY_ITM_BANK_CHRG_AMT AS Bank_Chg_Amt , cd.CODE_DESC AS Paymode , NVL(B.ADV_MONTH, 0) AS AdvanceMth , NVL(A.PAY_ITM_RUNNG_NO, ' ') AS RunningNo , NVL(ad.CODE_DESC, ' ') AS CardType , (CASE WHEN C.PV_MONTH IS NULL THEN SOM.PV_MONTH ELSE C.PV_MONTH END) AS PV_MONTH, (CASE WHEN C.PV_YEAR IS NULL THEN SOM.PV_YEAR ELSE C.PV_YEAR END) AS PV_YEAR, /* NVL(RCONST.NAME, ' ') AS Recon_Status , NVL(RCONM.F_BANK_JRNL_REF_NO, ' ') AS RCL_NO , */ NVL(CRCM.CRC_STATE_ID, 0) AS CRC_STATEMENT_NO , NVL(CRCST.NAME, ' ') AS CRC_STATUS , NVL(CRCM.CRC_STATE_REM, ' ') AS CRC_STATEMENT_REMARK , DDD1.CODE_NAME AS CustCategory , DDD2.CODE_NAME AS CustType , NVL(B.BATCH_PAY_ID, 0) AS BATCH_PAY_ID , NVL(mbb1.MEM_CODE, ' ') AS PAYMENTCOLLECTOR, GP.BANK_STATE_MAPPING_ID AS TRANS_ID, (CASE WHEN C.CRT_DT IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(SOM.CRT_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY') ELSE TO_CHAR(C.CRT_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY')END) AS ORD_CRT_DT FROM PAY0064D B JOIN PAY0065D A ON A.PAY_ID = B.PAY_ID /* JOIN PAY0009D GL ON GL.GL_RECIPT_ITM_ID = A.PAY_ITM_ID AND GL.GL_RECIPT_SETL_ACC_ID <> GL.GL_RECIPT_ACC_ID */ LEFT JOIN PAY0252T GP ON A.PAY_ITM_ID = GP.PAY_ITM_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0076D CRCD ON GP.CRC_STATE_MAPPING_ID = CRCD.CRC_TRNSC_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0075D CRCM ON CRCD.CRC_STATE_ID = CRCM.CRC_STATE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M CRCST ON CRCST.STUS_CODE_ID = CRCM.CRC_BC_STUS_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0081D RCOND ON GP.BANK_STATE_MAPPING_ID = RCOND.F_TRNSC_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0079D RCONM ON RCOND.F_BANK_JRNL_ID = RCONM.F_BANK_JRNL_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M RCONST ON RCONST.STUS_CODE_ID = RCONM.F_BANK_JRNL_STUS_ID /* LEFT JOIN PAY0076D RCRC ON RCRC.CRC_TRNSC_ID = TO_NUMBER(GL.GL_AUDIT_REF) LEFT JOIN PAY0075D RSTA ON RSTA.CRC_STATE_ID = RCRC.CRC_STATE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M RCRCST ON RCRCST.STUS_CODE_ID = RSTA.CRC_STATE_STUS_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0074D RCONS ON RCONS.F_DEP_RECON_ITM_PAY_ITM_ID = a.PAY_ITM_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0073D RCON ON RCON.F_DEP_RECON_ID = RCONS.F_DEP_RECON_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M RCONST ON RCONST.STUS_CODE_ID = RCON.F_DEP_RECON_STUS_ID */ LEFT JOIN PAY0007D BIL ON BIL.BILL_ID = B.BILL_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0001D SOM ON SOM.SALES_ORD_ID = BIL.BILL_SO_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0029D CTD ON CTD.CUST_ID = SOM.CUST_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M STC ON STC.STUS_CODE_ID = SOM.STUS_CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0001D C ON B.SALES_ORD_ID = C.SALES_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0029D D ON C.CUST_ID = D.CUST_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M DDD1 ON DDD1.CODE_ID = D.TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M DDD2 ON DDD2.CODE_ID = D.CORP_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0001M E ON A.PAY_ITM_BANK_ACC_ID = E.ACC_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0001M F ON B.BANK_ACC_ID = F.ACC_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0005M G ON B.BRNCH_ID = G.BRNCH_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M H ON B.UPD_USER_ID = H.USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M I ON A.PAY_ITM_MODE_ID = I.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M cd ON cd.CODE_ID = b.TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M j ON B.TYPE_ID = j.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M k ON a.PAY_ITM_CC_TYPE_ID = k.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M ad ON ad.CODE_ID = a.PAY_ITM_CARD_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0004M BNK ON BNK.BANK_ID = A.PAY_ITM_ISSU_BANK_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M l ON b.CRT_USER_ID = l.USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0040M sdm ON sdm.DEPT_ID = l.USER_DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M ssc ON ssc.STUS_CODE_ID = c.STUS_CODE_ID LEFT JOIN ORG0001D mbb ON mbb.MEM_ID = C.MEM_ID LEFT JOIN ORG0001D mbb1 ON mbb1.MEM_ID = B.COLL_MEM_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0069D trx ON trx.TRX_ID = B.TRX_ID WHERE trx.TRX_DT >= TO_DATE(#{payDateFr},'DD/MM/YYYY') AND trx.TRX_DT < TO_DATE(#{payDateTo},'DD/MM/YYYY') + 1 AND a.PAY_ITM_STUS_ID = 1 AND B.TYPE_ID NOT IN ( 224,225,226,227,222,93,223,228,229,230,231,232,233,234,235,236,237 ) UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT B.OR_NO RECIPT_NO , l.SALES_ORD_NO ORD_NO , TO_CHAR(trx.TRX_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS TRX_DATE, D.NAME , E.ACC_CODE BANK_ACC , F.ACC_CODE DEBT_CODE , G.CODE , A.PAY_ITM_APPV_NO , A.PAY_ITM_CHQ_NO , H.USER_NAME , I.CODE_DESC, A.PAY_ITM_AMT , A.PAY_ITM_REM, j.CODE , A.PAY_ITM_ORI_CC_NO FPAYITEMCCNO , NVL(b.TR_NO, ' ') TR_NO , NVL(a.PAY_ITM_REF_NO, ' ') REF_NO , (CASE WHEN a.PAY_ITM_IS_ONLINE = 1 THEN 'Online' WHEN a.PAY_ITM_IS_ONLINE = 2 THEN 'Offline' ELSE ' ' END) CRCMODE , M.CODE_DESC CRCTYPE , a.PAY_ITM_CC_HOLDER_NAME , a.PAY_ITM_CC_EXPR_DT , a.PAY_ITM_REF_DT REF_DT , N.USER_NAME KEYINBY , NVL(BNK.CODE, ' ') ISSUEDBANK , NVL(sdm.DEPT_NAME, ' ') DEPT_CODE , NVL(ssc.NAME, ' ') ORD_STUS , NVL(D.CUST_VA_NO, ' ') CUST_VA_NO , A.PAY_ITM_BANK_CHRG_AMT BANK_CHG_AMT , cd.CODE_DESC PAY_MODE , NVL(B.ADV_MONTH, 0) ADVANCEMTH , NVL(A.PAY_ITM_RUNNG_NO, ' ') RUNNINGNO , NVL(ad.CODE_DESC, ' ') CARD_TYPE , l.PV_MONTH, l.PV_YEAR, /* NVL(RCONST.NAME, ' ') RECON_STATUS , NVL(RCONM.F_BANK_JRNL_REF_NO, ' ') RCL_NO , */ NVL(CRCM.CRC_STATE_ID, 0) AS CRC_STATEMENT_NO , NVL(CRCST.NAME, ' ') CRC_STATUS , NVL(CRCM.CRC_STATE_REM, ' ') CRC_STATEMENT_REMARK , DDD1.CODE_NAME CUSTCATEGORY , DDD2.CODE_NAME CUST_TYPE , NVL(B.BATCH_PAY_ID, 0) BATCH_PAY_ID , NVL(mbb1.MEM_CODE, ' ') PAYMENTCOLLECTOR, GP.BANK_STATE_MAPPING_ID AS TRANS_ID, TO_CHAR(l.CRT_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS ORD_CRT_DT FROM PAY0064D B JOIN PAY0065D A ON A.PAY_ID = B.PAY_ID JOIN PAY0009D GL ON GL.GL_RECIPT_ITM_ID = A.PAY_ITM_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0252T GP ON A.PAY_ITM_ID = GP.PAY_ITM_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0076D CRCD ON GP.CRC_STATE_MAPPING_ID = CRCD.CRC_TRNSC_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0075D CRCM ON CRCD.CRC_STATE_ID = CRCM.CRC_STATE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M CRCST ON CRCST.STUS_CODE_ID = CRCM.CRC_BC_STUS_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0081D RCOND ON GP.BANK_STATE_MAPPING_ID = RCOND.F_TRNSC_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0079D RCONM ON RCOND.F_BANK_JRNL_ID = RCONM.F_BANK_JRNL_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M RCONST ON RCONST.STUS_CODE_ID = RCONM.F_BANK_JRNL_STUS_ID /* LEFT JOIN PAY0076D RCRC ON RCRC.CRC_TRNSC_ID = TO_NUMBER(GL.GL_AUDIT_REF) LEFT JOIN PAY0075D RSTA ON RSTA.CRC_STATE_ID = RCRC.CRC_STATE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M RCRCST ON RCRCST.STUS_CODE_ID = RSTA.CRC_STATE_STUS_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0074D RCONS ON RCONS.F_DEP_RECON_ITM_PAY_ITM_ID = a.PAY_ITM_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0073D RCON ON RCON.F_DEP_RECON_ID = RCONS.F_DEP_RECON_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M RCONST ON RCONST.STUS_CODE_ID = RCON.F_DEP_RECON_STUS_ID */ LEFT JOIN PAY0007D k ON B.BILL_ID = k.BILL_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0001D l ON k.BILL_SO_ID = l.SALES_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0029D D ON l.CUST_ID = D.CUST_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M DDD1 ON DDD1.CODE_ID = D.TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M DDD2 ON DDD2.CODE_ID = D.CORP_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0001M E ON A.PAY_ITM_BANK_ACC_ID = E.ACC_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0001M F ON B.BANK_ACC_ID = F.ACC_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0005M G ON B.BRNCH_ID = G.BRNCH_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M H ON B.UPD_USER_ID = H.USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M I ON A.PAY_ITM_MODE_ID = I.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M j ON k.BILL_TYPE_ID = j.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M cd ON cd.CODE_ID = b.TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M M ON a.PAY_ITM_CC_TYPE_ID = M.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M ad ON ad.CODE_ID = a.PAY_ITM_CARD_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0004M BNK ON BNK.BANK_ID = A.PAY_ITM_ISSU_BANK_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M N ON b.CRT_USER_ID = N.USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0040M sdm ON sdm.DEPT_ID = N.USER_DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M ssc ON ssc.STUS_CODE_ID = l.STUS_CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0001D som ON som.SALES_ORD_ID = B.SALES_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN ORG0001D mbb ON mbb.MEM_ID = som.MEM_ID LEFT JOIN ORG0001D mbb1 ON mbb1.MEM_ID = B.COLL_MEM_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0069D trx ON trx.TRX_ID = B.TRX_ID WHERE trx.TRX_DT >= TO_DATE(#{payDateFr},'DD/MM/YYYY') AND trx.TRX_DT < TO_DATE(#{payDateTo},'DD/MM/YYYY') + 1 AND a.PAY_ITM_STUS_ID = 1 AND B.TYPE_ID IN ( 93,223,228,229,230,231,232,233,234,235,236,237 ) UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT B.OR_NO RECIPT_NO , l.MEM_CODE ORD_NO , TO_CHAR(trx.TRX_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS TRX_DATE, l.NAME , E.ACC_CODE BANK_ACC , F.ACC_CODE DEBT_CODE , G.CODE , A.PAY_ITM_APPV_NO , A.PAY_ITM_CHQ_NO , H.USER_NAME , I.CODE_DESC , A.PAY_ITM_AMT , A.PAY_ITM_REM , j.CODE , A.PAY_ITM_ORI_CC_NO FPAYITEMCCNO , NVL(b.TR_NO, ' ') TR_NO , NVL(a.PAY_ITM_REF_NO, ' ') REF_NO , (CASE WHEN a.PAY_ITM_IS_ONLINE = 1 THEN 'Online' WHEN a.PAY_ITM_IS_ONLINE = 2 THEN 'Offline' ELSE ' ' END) CRCMODE , M.CODE_DESC CRCTYPE , a.PAY_ITM_CC_HOLDER_NAME , a.PAY_ITM_CC_EXPR_DT , a.PAY_ITM_REF_DT REF_DT , N.USER_NAME KEYINBY , NVL(BNK.CODE, ' ') ISSUEDBANK , NVL(sdm.DEPT_NAME, ' ') DEPT_CODE , ' ' ORD_STUS , ' ' CUST_VA_NO , A.PAY_ITM_BANK_CHRG_AMT BANK_CHG_AMT , cd.CODE_DESC PAY_MODE , NVL(B.ADV_MONTH, 0) ADVANCEMTH , NVL(A.PAY_ITM_RUNNG_NO, ' ') RUNNINGNO , NVL(ad.CODE_DESC, ' ') CARD_TYPE , 0 as PV_MONTH, 0 as PV_YEAR, /* NVL(RCONST.NAME, ' ') RECON_STATUS , NVL(RCONM.F_BANK_JRNL_REF_NO, ' ') RCL_NO , */ NVL(CRCM.CRC_STATE_ID, 0) AS CRC_STATEMENT_NO , NVL(CRCST.NAME, ' ') CRC_STATUS , NVL(CRCM.CRC_STATE_REM, ' ') CRC_STATEMENT_REMARK , ' ' CUSTCATEGORY , ' ' CUST_TYPE , NVL(B.BATCH_PAY_ID, 0) BATCH_PAY_ID , NVL(mbb1.MEM_CODE, ' ') PAYMENTCOLLECTOR, GP.BANK_STATE_MAPPING_ID AS TRANS_ID, TO_CHAR(l.CRT_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS ORD_CRT_DT FROM PAY0064D B JOIN PAY0065D A ON A.PAY_ID = B.PAY_ID JOIN PAY0009D GL ON GL.GL_RECIPT_ITM_ID = A.PAY_ITM_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0252T GP ON A.PAY_ITM_ID = GP.PAY_ITM_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0076D CRCD ON GP.CRC_STATE_MAPPING_ID = CRCD.CRC_TRNSC_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0075D CRCM ON CRCD.CRC_STATE_ID = CRCM.CRC_STATE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M CRCST ON CRCST.STUS_CODE_ID = CRCM.CRC_BC_STUS_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0081D RCOND ON GP.BANK_STATE_MAPPING_ID = RCOND.F_TRNSC_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0079D RCONM ON RCOND.F_BANK_JRNL_ID = RCONM.F_BANK_JRNL_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M RCONST ON RCONST.STUS_CODE_ID = RCONM.F_BANK_JRNL_STUS_ID /* LEFT JOIN PAY0076D RCRC ON RCRC.CRC_TRNSC_ID = UTILS.CONVERT_TO_NUMBER(GL.GL_AUDIT_REF,10,0) LEFT JOIN PAY0075D RSTA ON RSTA.CRC_STATE_ID = RCRC.CRC_STATE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M RCRCST ON RCRCST.STUS_CODE_ID = RSTA.CRC_STATE_STUS_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0074D RCONS ON RCONS.F_DEP_RECON_ITM_PAY_ITM_ID = a.PAY_ITM_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0073D RCON ON RCON.F_DEP_RECON_ID = RCONS.F_DEP_RECON_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M RCONST ON RCONST.STUS_CODE_ID = RCON.F_DEP_RECON_STUS_ID */ LEFT JOIN PAY0007D k ON B.BILL_ID = k.BILL_ID LEFT JOIN ORG0001D l ON k.BILL_MEM_ID = l.MEM_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0001M E ON A.PAY_ITM_BANK_ACC_ID = E.ACC_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0001M F ON B.BANK_ACC_ID = F.ACC_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0005M G ON B.BRNCH_ID = G.BRNCH_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M H ON B.UPD_USER_ID = H.USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M I ON A.PAY_ITM_MODE_ID = I.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M j ON k.BILL_TYPE_ID = j.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M cd ON cd.CODE_ID = b.TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M M ON a.PAY_ITM_CC_TYPE_ID = M.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M ad ON ad.CODE_ID = a.PAY_ITM_CARD_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0004M BNK ON BNK.BANK_ID = A.PAY_ITM_ISSU_BANK_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M N ON b.CRT_USER_ID = N.USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0040M sdm ON sdm.DEPT_ID = N.USER_DEPT_ID /* LEFT JOIN SAL0001D som ON som.SALES_ORD_NO = l.MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN ORG0001D mbb ON mbb.MEM_ID = som.MEM_ID */ LEFT JOIN ORG0001D mbb1 ON mbb1.MEM_ID = B.COLL_MEM_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0069D trx ON trx.TRX_ID = B.TRX_ID WHERE trx.TRX_DT >= TO_DATE(#{payDateFr},'DD/MM/YYYY') AND trx.TRX_DT < TO_DATE(#{payDateTo},'DD/MM/YYYY') + 1 AND a.PAY_ITM_STUS_ID = 1 AND B.TYPE_ID IN ( 224,225,226,227,222 ) )

SELECT B.OR_NO AS RECEIPTNO, ( CASE WHEN (C.SALES_ORD_NO IS NULL AND B.SALES_ORD_ID != 0) THEN SOM.SALES_ORD_NO ELSE CASE WHEN (supm.SUP_REF_NO IS NOT NULL AND B.SALES_ORD_ID = 0) THEN supm.SUP_REF_NO ELSE C.SALES_ORD_NO END END ) AS ORDERNO, TO_CHAR(trx.TRX_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS TRX_DATE, ( CASE WHEN (D.NAME IS NULL AND B.SALES_ORD_ID != 0)THEN CTD.NAME ELSE CASE WHEN (B.SALES_ORD_ID = 0 AND supm.SUP_REF_NO IS NOT NULL) THEN c5.NAME ELSE D.NAME END END ) AS NAME, E.ACC_CODE AS BANK_ACC, F.ACC_CODE AS DEBT_CODE, G.CODE AS BranchCode, A.PAY_ITM_APPV_NO AS PayItemAppvNo, A.PAY_ITM_CHQ_NO AS PayItemChqNo, H.USER_NAME AS UserName, I.CODE_DESC AS Description, cm.CODE_NAME AS CardMode, A.PAY_ITM_AMT AS PayItemAmt, A.PAY_ITM_REM AS PayItemRemark, j.CODE AS code, A.PAY_ITM_ORI_CC_NO AS fPayItemCCNo, NVL(b.TR_NO, ' ') AS TR_NO, NVL(a.PAY_ITM_REF_NO, ' ') AS REF_NO, NVL(b.REF_DTL,' ') AS REF_DTL, (CASE WHEN a.PAY_ITM_IS_ONLINE = 1 THEN 'Online' WHEN a.PAY_ITM_IS_ONLINE = 2 THEN 'Offline' ELSE ' ' END) AS CRCMode, k.CODE_DESC AS CRCType, a.PAY_ITM_CC_HOLDER_NAME AS PayItemCCHolderName, a.PAY_ITM_CC_EXPR_DT AS PayItemCCExpiryDate, a.PAY_ITM_REF_DT AS RefDate, l.USER_NAME AS keyInBy, NVL(BNK.CODE, ' ') AS issuedBank, NVL(sdm.DEPT_NAME, ' ') AS DeptCode, (CASE WHEN ssc.NAME IS NULL THEN STC.NAME ELSE SSC.NAME END) AS OrderStatus, (CASE WHEN D.CUST_VA_NO IS NULL THEN CTD.CUST_VA_NO ELSE D.CUST_VA_NO END) AS custVaNo, A.PAY_ITM_BANK_CHRG_AMT AS Bank_Chg_Amt, cd.CODE_DESC AS Paymode, NVL(B.ADV_MONTH, 0) AS AdvanceMth, NVL(A.PAY_ITM_RUNNG_NO, ' ') AS RunningNo, NVL(ad.CODE_DESC, ' ') AS CardType, (CASE WHEN C.PV_MONTH IS NULL THEN SOM.PV_MONTH ELSE C.PV_MONTH END) AS PV_MONTH, (CASE WHEN C.PV_YEAR IS NULL THEN SOM.PV_YEAR ELSE C.PV_YEAR END) AS PV_YEAR, /* NVL(RCONST.NAME, ' ') AS Recon_Status, NVL(RCONM.F_BANK_JRNL_REF_NO, ' ') AS RCL_NO, */ NVL(CRCM.CRC_STATE_ID, 0) AS CRC_STATEMENT_NO, NVL(CRCST.NAME, ' ') AS CRC_STATUS, NVL(CRCM.CRC_STATE_REM, ' ') AS CRC_STATEMENT_REMARK, DDD1.CODE_NAME AS CustCategory, DDD2.CODE_NAME AS CustType, NVL(B.BATCH_PAY_ID, 0) AS BATCH_PAY_ID, NVL(mbb1.MEM_CODE, ' ') AS PAYMENTCOLLECTOR, GP.BANK_STATE_MAPPING_ID AS TRANS_ID, (CASE WHEN C.CRT_DT IS NULL THEN TO_CHAR(SOM.CRT_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY') ELSE TO_CHAR(C.CRT_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY')END) AS ORD_CRT_DT, GP.KEY_IN_SCRN FROM PAY0064D B JOIN PAY0065D A ON A.PAY_ID = B.PAY_ID /* JOIN PAY0009D GL ON GL.GL_RECIPT_ITM_ID = A.PAY_ITM_ID AND GL.GL_RECIPT_SETL_ACC_ID <> GL.GL_RECIPT_ACC_ID */ LEFT JOIN PAY0252T GP ON A.PAY_ITM_ID = GP.PAY_ITM_ID AND GP.PAY_ID = B.PAY_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0076D CRCD ON GP.CRC_STATE_MAPPING_ID = CRCD.CRC_TRNSC_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0075D CRCM ON CRCD.CRC_STATE_ID = CRCM.CRC_STATE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M CRCST ON CRCST.STUS_CODE_ID = CRCM.CRC_BC_STUS_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0081D RCOND ON GP.BANK_STATE_MAPPING_ID = RCOND.F_TRNSC_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0079D RCONM ON RCOND.F_BANK_JRNL_ID = RCONM.F_BANK_JRNL_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M RCONST ON RCONST.STUS_CODE_ID = RCONM.F_BANK_JRNL_STUS_ID /* LEFT JOIN PAY0076D RCRC ON RCRC.CRC_TRNSC_ID = TO_NUMBER(GL.GL_AUDIT_REF) LEFT JOIN PAY0075D RSTA ON RSTA.CRC_STATE_ID = RCRC.CRC_STATE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M RCRCST ON RCRCST.STUS_CODE_ID = RSTA.CRC_STATE_STUS_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0074D RCONS ON RCONS.F_DEP_RECON_ITM_PAY_ITM_ID = a.PAY_ITM_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0073D RCON ON RCON.F_DEP_RECON_ID = RCONS.F_DEP_RECON_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M RCONST ON RCONST.STUS_CODE_ID = RCON.F_DEP_RECON_STUS_ID */ LEFT JOIN PAY0007D BIL ON BIL.BILL_ID = B.BILL_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0001D SOM ON SOM.SALES_ORD_ID = BIL.BILL_SO_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0029D CTD ON CTD.CUST_ID = SOM.CUST_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M STC ON STC.STUS_CODE_ID = SOM.STUS_CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0001D C ON B.SALES_ORD_ID = C.SALES_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0029D D ON C.CUST_ID = D.CUST_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M DDD1 ON DDD1.CODE_ID = D.TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M DDD2 ON DDD2.CODE_ID = D.CORP_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0001M E ON A.PAY_ITM_BANK_ACC_ID = E.ACC_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0001M F ON B.BANK_ACC_ID = F.ACC_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0005M G ON B.BRNCH_ID = G.BRNCH_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M H ON B.UPD_USER_ID = H.USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M I ON A.PAY_ITM_MODE_ID = I.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M cd ON cd.CODE_ID = b.TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M j ON B.TYPE_ID = j.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M k ON a.PAY_ITM_CC_TYPE_ID = k.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M ad ON ad.CODE_ID = a.PAY_ITM_CARD_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0004M BNK ON BNK.BANK_ID = A.PAY_ITM_ISSU_BANK_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M l ON b.CRT_USER_ID = l.USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0040M sdm ON sdm.DEPT_ID = l.USER_DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M ssc ON ssc.STUS_CODE_ID = c.STUS_CODE_ID LEFT JOIN ORG0001D mbb ON mbb.MEM_ID = C.MEM_ID LEFT JOIN ORG0001D mbb1 ON mbb1.MEM_ID = B.COLL_MEM_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0069D trx ON trx.TRX_ID = B.TRX_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M cm ON cm.CODE_ID = a.PAY_ITM_CARD_MODE_ID LEFT JOIN SUP0001M supm ON supm.SUP_REF_NO = BIL.BILL_NO /*supplement master*/ LEFT JOIN SAL0029D c5 ON c5.CUST_ID = supm.CUST_ID /*supplement customer information*/ WHERE trx.TRX_DT >= TO_DATE(#{payDateFr},'DD/MM/YYYY') AND trx.TRX_DT < TO_DATE(#{payDateTo},'DD/MM/YYYY') + 1 AND a.PAY_ITM_STUS_ID = 1 AND B.TYPE_ID NOT IN (224,225,226,227,222,93,223,228,229,230,231,232,233,234,235,236,237)
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT B.OR_NO RECIPT_NO, l.SALES_ORD_NO ORD_NO, TO_CHAR(trx.TRX_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS TRX_DATE, D.NAME , E.ACC_CODE BANK_ACC, F.ACC_CODE DEBT_CODE, G.CODE, A.PAY_ITM_APPV_NO, A.PAY_ITM_CHQ_NO, H.USER_NAME, I.CODE_DESC, cm.CODE_NAME, A.PAY_ITM_AMT, A.PAY_ITM_REM, j.CODE, A.PAY_ITM_ORI_CC_NO FPAYITEMCCNO, NVL(b.TR_NO, ' ') TR_NO, NVL(a.PAY_ITM_REF_NO, ' ') REF_NO, NVL(b.REF_DTL,' ') AS REF_DTL, (CASE WHEN a.PAY_ITM_IS_ONLINE = 1 THEN 'Online' WHEN a.PAY_ITM_IS_ONLINE = 2 THEN 'Offline' ELSE ' ' END ) CRCMODE, M.CODE_DESC CRCTYPE, a.PAY_ITM_CC_HOLDER_NAME, a.PAY_ITM_CC_EXPR_DT, a.PAY_ITM_REF_DT REF_DT, N.USER_NAME KEYINBY, NVL(BNK.CODE, ' ') ISSUEDBANK, NVL(sdm.DEPT_NAME, ' ') DEPT_CODE, NVL(ssc.NAME, ' ') ORD_STUS, NVL(D.CUST_VA_NO, ' ') CUST_VA_NO, A.PAY_ITM_BANK_CHRG_AMT BANK_CHG_AMT, cd.CODE_DESC PAY_MODE, NVL(B.ADV_MONTH, 0) ADVANCEMTH, NVL(A.PAY_ITM_RUNNG_NO, ' ') RUNNINGNO, NVL(ad.CODE_DESC, ' ') CARD_TYPE, l.PV_MONTH, l.PV_YEAR, /* NVL(RCONST.NAME, ' ') RECON_STATUS, NVL(RCONM.F_BANK_JRNL_REF_NO, ' ') RCL_NO, */ NVL(CRCM.CRC_STATE_ID, 0) AS CRC_STATEMENT_NO, NVL(CRCST.NAME, ' ') CRC_STATUS, NVL(CRCM.CRC_STATE_REM, ' ') CRC_STATEMENT_REMARK, DDD1.CODE_NAME CUSTCATEGORY, DDD2.CODE_NAME CUST_TYPE, NVL(B.BATCH_PAY_ID, 0) BATCH_PAY_ID, NVL(mbb1.MEM_CODE, ' ') PAYMENTCOLLECTOR, GP.BANK_STATE_MAPPING_ID AS TRANS_ID, TO_CHAR(l.CRT_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS ORD_CRT_DT, GP.KEY_IN_SCRN FROM PAY0064D B JOIN PAY0065D A ON A.PAY_ID = B.PAY_ID JOIN PAY0009D GL ON GL.GL_RECIPT_ITM_ID = A.PAY_ITM_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0252T GP ON A.PAY_ITM_ID = GP.PAY_ITM_ID AND GP.PAY_ID = B.PAY_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0076D CRCD ON GP.CRC_STATE_MAPPING_ID = CRCD.CRC_TRNSC_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0075D CRCM ON CRCD.CRC_STATE_ID = CRCM.CRC_STATE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M CRCST ON CRCST.STUS_CODE_ID = CRCM.CRC_BC_STUS_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0081D RCOND ON GP.BANK_STATE_MAPPING_ID = RCOND.F_TRNSC_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0079D RCONM ON RCOND.F_BANK_JRNL_ID = RCONM.F_BANK_JRNL_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M RCONST ON RCONST.STUS_CODE_ID = RCONM.F_BANK_JRNL_STUS_ID /* LEFT JOIN PAY0076D RCRC ON RCRC.CRC_TRNSC_ID = TO_NUMBER(GL.GL_AUDIT_REF) LEFT JOIN PAY0075D RSTA ON RSTA.CRC_STATE_ID = RCRC.CRC_STATE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M RCRCST ON RCRCST.STUS_CODE_ID = RSTA.CRC_STATE_STUS_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0074D RCONS ON RCONS.F_DEP_RECON_ITM_PAY_ITM_ID = a.PAY_ITM_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0073D RCON ON RCON.F_DEP_RECON_ID = RCONS.F_DEP_RECON_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M RCONST ON RCONST.STUS_CODE_ID = RCON.F_DEP_RECON_STUS_ID */ LEFT JOIN PAY0007D k ON B.BILL_ID = k.BILL_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0001D l ON k.BILL_SO_ID = l.SALES_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0029D D ON l.CUST_ID = D.CUST_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M DDD1 ON DDD1.CODE_ID = D.TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M DDD2 ON DDD2.CODE_ID = D.CORP_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0001M E ON A.PAY_ITM_BANK_ACC_ID = E.ACC_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0001M F ON B.BANK_ACC_ID = F.ACC_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0005M G ON B.BRNCH_ID = G.BRNCH_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M H ON B.UPD_USER_ID = H.USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M I ON A.PAY_ITM_MODE_ID = I.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M j ON k.BILL_TYPE_ID = j.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M cd ON cd.CODE_ID = b.TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M M ON a.PAY_ITM_CC_TYPE_ID = M.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M ad ON ad.CODE_ID = a.PAY_ITM_CARD_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0004M BNK ON BNK.BANK_ID = A.PAY_ITM_ISSU_BANK_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M N ON b.CRT_USER_ID = N.USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0040M sdm ON sdm.DEPT_ID = N.USER_DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M ssc ON ssc.STUS_CODE_ID = l.STUS_CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SAL0001D som ON som.SALES_ORD_ID = B.SALES_ORD_ID LEFT JOIN ORG0001D mbb ON mbb.MEM_ID = som.MEM_ID LEFT JOIN ORG0001D mbb1 ON mbb1.MEM_ID = B.COLL_MEM_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0069D trx ON trx.TRX_ID = B.TRX_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M cm ON cm.CODE_ID = A.PAY_ITM_CARD_MODE_ID WHERE trx.TRX_DT >= TO_DATE(#{payDateFr},'DD/MM/YYYY') AND trx.TRX_DT < TO_DATE(#{payDateTo},'DD/MM/YYYY') + 1 AND a.PAY_ITM_STUS_ID = 1 AND B.TYPE_ID IN ( 93,223,228,229,230,231,232,233,234,235,236,237 )
UNION ALL
SELECT DISTINCT B.OR_NO RECIPT_NO, l.MEM_CODE ORD_NO, TO_CHAR(trx.TRX_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS TRX_DATE, l.NAME, E.ACC_CODE BANK_ACC, F.ACC_CODE DEBT_CODE, G.CODE, A.PAY_ITM_APPV_NO, A.PAY_ITM_CHQ_NO, H.USER_NAME, I.CODE_DESC, cm.CODE_NAME, A.PAY_ITM_AMT, A.PAY_ITM_REM, j.CODE, A.PAY_ITM_ORI_CC_NO FPAYITEMCCNO, NVL(b.TR_NO, ' ') TR_NO, NVL(a.PAY_ITM_REF_NO, ' ') REF_NO, NVL(b.REF_DTL,' ') AS REF_DTL, (CASE WHEN a.PAY_ITM_IS_ONLINE = 1 THEN 'Online' WHEN a.PAY_ITM_IS_ONLINE = 2 THEN 'Offline' ELSE ' ' END) CRCMODE, M.CODE_DESC CRCTYPE, a.PAY_ITM_CC_HOLDER_NAME, a.PAY_ITM_CC_EXPR_DT, a.PAY_ITM_REF_DT REF_DT, N.USER_NAME KEYINBY, NVL(BNK.CODE, ' ') ISSUEDBANK, NVL(sdm.DEPT_NAME, ' ') DEPT_CODE, ' ' ORD_STUS, ' ' CUST_VA_NO, A.PAY_ITM_BANK_CHRG_AMT BANK_CHG_AMT, cd.CODE_DESC PAY_MODE, NVL(B.ADV_MONTH, 0) ADVANCEMTH, NVL(A.PAY_ITM_RUNNG_NO, ' ') RUNNINGNO, NVL(ad.CODE_DESC, ' ') CARD_TYPE, 0 as PV_MONTH, 0 as PV_YEAR, /* NVL(RCONST.NAME, ' ') RECON_STATUS, NVL(RCONM.F_BANK_JRNL_REF_NO, ' ') RCL_NO, */ NVL(CRCM.CRC_STATE_ID, 0) AS CRC_STATEMENT_NO, NVL(CRCST.NAME, ' ') CRC_STATUS , NVL(CRCM.CRC_STATE_REM, ' ') CRC_STATEMENT_REMARK, ' ' CUSTCATEGORY, ' ' CUST_TYPE, NVL(B.BATCH_PAY_ID, 0) BATCH_PAY_ID, NVL(mbb1.MEM_CODE, ' ') PAYMENTCOLLECTOR, GP.BANK_STATE_MAPPING_ID AS TRANS_ID, TO_CHAR(l.CRT_DT,'DD/MM/YYYY') AS ORD_CRT_DT, GP.KEY_IN_SCRN FROM PAY0064D B JOIN PAY0065D A ON A.PAY_ID = B.PAY_ID JOIN PAY0009D GL ON GL.GL_RECIPT_ITM_ID = A.PAY_ITM_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0252T GP ON A.PAY_ITM_ID = GP.PAY_ITM_ID AND GP.PAY_ID = B.PAY_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0076D CRCD ON GP.CRC_STATE_MAPPING_ID = CRCD.CRC_TRNSC_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0075D CRCM ON CRCD.CRC_STATE_ID = CRCM.CRC_STATE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M CRCST ON CRCST.STUS_CODE_ID = CRCM.CRC_BC_STUS_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0081D RCOND ON GP.BANK_STATE_MAPPING_ID = RCOND.F_TRNSC_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0079D RCONM ON RCOND.F_BANK_JRNL_ID = RCONM.F_BANK_JRNL_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M RCONST ON RCONST.STUS_CODE_ID = RCONM.F_BANK_JRNL_STUS_ID /* LEFT JOIN PAY0076D RCRC ON RCRC.CRC_TRNSC_ID = UTILS.CONVERT_TO_NUMBER(GL.GL_AUDIT_REF,10,0) LEFT JOIN PAY0075D RSTA ON RSTA.CRC_STATE_ID = RCRC.CRC_STATE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M RCRCST ON RCRCST.STUS_CODE_ID = RSTA.CRC_STATE_STUS_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0074D RCONS ON RCONS.F_DEP_RECON_ITM_PAY_ITM_ID = a.PAY_ITM_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0073D RCON ON RCON.F_DEP_RECON_ID = RCONS.F_DEP_RECON_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0038M RCONST ON RCONST.STUS_CODE_ID = RCON.F_DEP_RECON_STUS_ID */ LEFT JOIN PAY0007D k ON B.BILL_ID = k.BILL_ID LEFT JOIN ORG0001D l ON k.BILL_MEM_ID = l.MEM_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0001M E ON A.PAY_ITM_BANK_ACC_ID = E.ACC_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0001M F ON B.BANK_ACC_ID = F.ACC_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0005M G ON B.BRNCH_ID = G.BRNCH_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M H ON B.UPD_USER_ID = H.USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M I ON A.PAY_ITM_MODE_ID = I.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M j ON k.BILL_TYPE_ID = j.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M cd ON cd.CODE_ID = b.TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M M ON a.PAY_ITM_CC_TYPE_ID = M.CODE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M ad ON ad.CODE_ID = a.PAY_ITM_CARD_TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0004M BNK ON BNK.BANK_ID = A.PAY_ITM_ISSU_BANK_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0047M N ON b.CRT_USER_ID = N.USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0040M sdm ON sdm.DEPT_ID = N.USER_DEPT_ID /* LEFT JOIN SAL0001D som ON som.SALES_ORD_NO = l.MEM_CODE LEFT JOIN ORG0001D mbb ON mbb.MEM_ID = som.MEM_ID */ LEFT JOIN ORG0001D mbb1 ON mbb1.MEM_ID = B.COLL_MEM_ID LEFT JOIN PAY0069D trx ON trx.TRX_ID = B.TRX_ID LEFT JOIN SYS0013M cm ON cm.CODE_ID = A.PAY_ITM_CARD_MODE_ID WHERE trx.TRX_DT >= TO_DATE(#{payDateFr},'DD/MM/YYYY') AND trx.TRX_DT < TO_DATE(#{payDateTo},'DD/MM/YYYY') + 1 AND a.PAY_ITM_STUS_ID = 1 AND B.TYPE_ID IN (224,225,226,227,222)
